stories.headline: Finding files for mapping
stories.summary: This article explores the availability of geographic information system (GIS) data online, especially from government sites, and introduces the federal initiative Geospatial One-Stop, aimed at easing GIS data access.

stories.headline: Data shows woes for middle-class blacks
stories.summary: An analysis of U.S. Census Bureau data reveals that middle-class blacks in Chicago live closer to poverty and crime compared to their white counterparts, highlighting social disparities within economic classes.

stories.headline: White-collar convicts get lighter sentences
stories.summary: This article investigates lighter sentencing trends for white-collar criminals in Northern Alabama federal courts compared to harsher sentences for drug-related offenses.
